titles: Some observations made upon the Brasillian root, called ipepocoanha, imported from the Indies shewing its wonderful virtue against vomiting and looseness / written by a physitian in the countrey to the president of the Colledge of Physitians in London.
author: Griffith, Richard, 1635?-1691.
Pechey, John, 1655-1716.
notes: Wrongly attributed to John Pechey by Surgeon general's catalogue (ser. 1); to John Pechey by Mansell; and to Dr. Griffith by Halkett and Laing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
